meaningMnemonic: You're in a <radical>net</radical> but you have the <radical>ability</radical> to quit playing along and <kanji>leave</kanji> at any time.
readingMnemonic: You don't know if you want to <kanji>quit</kanji> this charade until you feel an uncomfortable <reading>hea</reading>t (ひ). You look down and the net you're in is being hung above a large fire.
